changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createView: SELECT base_table.id, p.name AS parent, sc.name AS status_code, base_table.sequence_number, ns.name AS next_sibling, nss.name AS next_sibling_status, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM product_sibling_sequencing_authorization base_table JOIN product p ON base_table.parent = p.id JOIN status_code sc ON base_table.status_code = sc.id LEFT JOIN product ns ON base_table.next_sibling = ns.id LEFT JOIN status_code nss ON base_table.next_sibling_status = nss.id JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id
